project_plan.name: Temperature Converter CLI Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin based on user input.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion functionality for Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion functionality for Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion functionality for Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion functionality for Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion functionality for Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion functionality for Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Implement user interface for input and output of temperature conversions
Write tests for all conversion functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
